title: OsvaV Economy Intelligence
description: Major stability, permissions, and settings overhaul with improved Economy data clarity.
changes: Settings: Fixed persistence issue where values reverted to defaults after resource restart
Settings: Removed incorrect 'read-only in production' restriction; settings are now editable based solely on permissions
Permissions: Fully refactored admin-gating system to be 100% config-driven (no hardcoded groups)
Permissions: Improved QBCore / QBox (qbx_core) permission detection reliability
Economy UI: Improved 'Unavailable' states with clear, data-driven explanations
Economy UI: Added data readiness indicators (transactions, snapshots, freshness)
Integrations: Export-based integration layer stabilized for third-party banking scripts (e.g. tgg_banking)
Integrations: Improved QBox compatibility for player data and transactions
Stability: Multiple edge-case fixes preventing UI desync and server-side errors
General: Code cleanup and internal consistency improvements
